description: Saltholmen is a new product line, where they have used their favorite yarn from SŸdwolle, in Super Fine Merino, and added some Creora-Eco-Soft for elasticity. Their classic Breton stripes adds a maritime look to these merino pieces, which are perfect for layering when you are boating. As you know, the weather can be quite windy and cold out at sea, even in Summer. So, wearing pieces that are breathable under your mid-layer or shell jacket, keeps you warm in the cold wind, but at the same time, it keeps you ventilated when you are wearing it without any layering. Merino wool is perfect for vacationing on boats, where you try to keep your luggage to a minimum. Merino does not have to be washed after each use, just hang it out to be aired and it will feel nice and fresh for the next time you want to wear it. The zip-up top has a slightly fitted shape, with flat lock seams for better comfort. It has a small, soft, woven badge on the left sleeve, and a zipper for ventilation. Wear it as a base layer, or as a piece on its own, with your shorts.
name: We Norwegians Saltholmen Zip Up - Mens
